content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the vilnius city district court the case involves the division of matrimonial property between the applicant and the defendant the court has decided to divide the property and register it in the real estate register the defendant has been ordered to pay the applicant a compensation amount and fulfill their obligations under a credit agreement the applicant is discharged from their obligations under the banking agreement the court has also dissolved the marriage due to fault on both parties and determined the division of the matrimonial property the defendant has been awarded a singlefamily dwelling house and other structures on the land the defendant is required to reimburse the applicant for any expenses related to the credit agreement the court has dismissed the remainder of the applicants application and ordered the defendant to pay costs both parties are required to pay stamp duty fees to the state budget
